scripts.deploy:core: cd contracts && forge script script/DeployEigenLayerCore.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast --optimize --optimizer-runs 200 --via-ir
scripts.deploy:hello-world: cd contracts && forge script script/HelloWorldDeployer.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast --optimize --optimizer-runs 200 --via-ir
scripts.deploy:core-debug: cd contracts && forge script script/DeployEigenLayerCore.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast --revert-strings debug --optimize --optimizer-runs 200 --via-ir
scripts.deploy:hello-world-debug: cd contracts && forge script script/HelloWorldDeployer.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast --revert-strings debug
scripts.create-distributions-root: cd contracts && forge script script/SetupDistributions.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast -v --sender 0xf39fd6e51aad88f6f4ce6ab8827279cfffb92266
scripts.claim-distributions: cd contracts && forge script script/SetupDistributions.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast --sig "executeProcessClaim()" -v --sender 0xf39fd6e51aad88f6f4ce6ab8827279cfffb92266
scripts.create-operator-directed-distributions-r: cd contracts && forge script script/SetupDistributions.s.sol --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast --sig "runOperatorDirected()" -v --sender 0xf39fd6e51aad88f6f4ce6ab8827279cfffb92266
